name: The Secret of Witch Island
description:
Ian is a freelance animation writer and this is his first official game project.  Wahoo! Follow him on twitter for infrequent hot takes and the game's slapdash development log cataloging each day of #Devtober.  @Ian_Rickett 

The game's cover image was made by real life friend and artist Zak Eidsvoog. Check out his portfolio for more of his work. zakeidsvoog.com
